subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade finished with 50 points, 10 rebounds and 9 assists and the Heat pulled off two last-ditch rallies Saturday before beating the Utah Jazz in triple-overtime, 140-129.
snippet: Dwyane Wade finished with 50 points, 10 rebounds and 9 assists and the Heat pulled off two last-ditch rallies Saturday before beating the Utah Jazz in triple-overtime, 140-129.
